text: Need Scarlett Turner for Freedom campaign. Budget around $4,529, looking for 1 x Blog post, 3 x Instagram post, 2 x Twitter post, 2 x 15-second TikTok. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
